articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: “There will be no transaction with FTX, I think that is quite obvious,” Voyager's attorney said at a hearing on Tuesday.
articles.title: Voyager 'Shocked, Disgruntled, Dismayed' by FTX Bankruptcy as Crypto Lender Searches for Another Buyer

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: FTX’s new post-bankruptcy leader may not be a fan of Sam Bankman-Fried’s social media transparency.
articles.title: New FTX CEO Distances Company From SBF After Controversial DMs Surface

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Following FTX’s collapse, assets on its NFT marketplace can’t be withdrawn—and some FTX-minted NFTs are broken too.
articles.title: Coachella NFTs Sold for $1.5M—Now They’re Stuck on FTX

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Bahamas Securities Commission wants to take control of FTX’s liquidation. But FTX wants the process to take place in the U.S.
articles.title: Bahamas Regulators Want Control of FTX Bankruptcy Proceedings

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The Treasury Secretary reiterated concerns that trouble in the crypto market could eventually "raise broader financial stability concerns."
articles.title: Janet Yellen: FTX Meltdown Shows Need for 'More Effective Oversight' of Crypto

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Founder Max Boonen says the gesture is intended to “support the wider market.”
articles.title: Crypto Liquidity Provider B2C2 Offers to Purchase Loans from Genesis

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs are sinking in value this month, with the floor price now down 84% from the April peak.
articles.title: Justin Bieber Paid $1.3 Million for a Bored Ape NFT. It’s Now Worth $69K

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Gemini went down today for less than an hour after announcing its lending partner was pausing withdrawals.
articles.title: Gemini Restores Service to Exchange After Outage Spooks Investors

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: With Genesis, one of Gemini's lending providers, suspending withdrawals, rates on Aave went haywire as speculators fled GUSD or shorted it.
articles.title: Gemini Dollar Lending Rates Spiked as High as 73% on Aave Amid Genesis Freeze

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried is facing a class action lawsuit from FTX investors alleging the firm’s yield-bearing crypto accounts broke Florida laws.
articles.title: FTX Lawsuit Takes Aim at Larry David, Tom Brady for Promoting Crypto Exchange

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Lawmakers want to hear from Sam Bankman-Fried and others involved following the “tremendous harm” the FTX collapse posed to investors.
articles.title: House Committee Calls on SBF, Binance to Testify on FTX Collapse

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: FTX’s largest-disclosed sponsorship is on pause after the exchange declared bankruptcy on Friday.
articles.title: Esports Giant TSM Suspends $210M FTX Naming Rights Deal

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Alongside the Series C round, Matter Labs is also open-sourcing its code for its zero-knowledge technology zkSync.
articles.title: Matter Labs Raises $200M to Scale Ethereum With zkSync Solution

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Crypto exchange Gemini announced that there may be withdrawal delays to its Earn product due to its lending partner halting withdrawals.
articles.title: Gemini Earn Warns Customers of Likely Withdrawal Delays Due to Genesis Lending Pause

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: After a volatile week amid the collapse of FTX, crypto prime broker Genesis announced that it would pause withdrawals from its lending arm.
articles.title: Genesis Suspending Client Withdrawals for Lending Arm Citing 'FTX Impact'

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Core Scientific is being sued for allegedly failing to disclose several high-profile disputes with its clients in its statements to shareholders.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific Facing Lawsuit for Improperly Disclosing Financials

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Solana emerged as the week’s worst-performing crypto asset as one of the project’s early backers FTX went insolvent.
articles.title: Solana Plummets More Than 41% Over The Week Amid FTX Collapse

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The FTX affiliate was established in the largest nation in Oceania eight months ago.
articles.title: Australian Authorities Suspend License of FTX Australia

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Mainstream financial institutions are working with the Federal Reserve to test a digital currency platform.
articles.title: U.S. Banks Launch a Digital Dollar Blockchain Pilot

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The patent would allow gamers to own unique in-game assets and collectibles from their favorite esports stars.
articles.title: Sony Files Patent for Tracking In-Game Digital Assets With NFTs

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Posts from a since-deleted blog linked to Caroline Ellison, Alameda Research’s former CEO, reveal the FTX-affiliated executive’s controversial views.
articles.title: Tumblr Blog Linked to Ex-Alameda CEO Explored Race Science, ‘Imperial Chinese Harem’ Polyamory

articles.author: Daniel Roberts,Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The struggling crypto lender paused customer withdrawals last week, and is now exploring a Chapter 11 filing, a source at the company tells Decrypt.
articles.title: BlockFi Mulls Bankruptcy Filing and Layoffs in Wake of FTX Collapse, Met With Binance

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: USDC issuer Circle cited FTX's collapse and Binance auto-conversions of USDC to BUSD for "materially lower" projections in an SEC filing.
articles.title: Circle Reveals FTX Exposure, Says USDC Conversions on Binance Have Hurt Projections

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: SALT is the latest crypto company caught up in fhe contagion sparked by the fall of Sam Bankman-Fried's empire.
articles.title: Crypto Lender SALT Halts Withdrawals After FTX Collapse

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The embattled crypto businessman has been making unusual statements on Twitter and to the press since the FTX collapse.
articles.title: SBF Won't Stop Tweeting, Now Claims FTX US 'Had Enough to Repay All Customers'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The scale at which Alameda has been frontrunning FTX listings is "much, much greater" than what we've seen before in crypto, according Argus co-founder Owen Rapaport.
articles.title: Alameda Allegedly Traded These 18 Tokens on Insider Info Through FTX

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: "This country does not need a currency that’s good for kidnappers,” he added.
articles.title: Charlie Munger Compares Bitcoin to Child Trafficking, Likes Central Banks

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Buterin agreed that the embattled CEO’s embrace of “effective altruism” contributed to FTX’s downfall.
articles.title: Ethereum Co-Founder Vitalik Buterin Weighs in on Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX ‘Fraud’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Fresh data from the Labor Department shows that inflation may finally be easing.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Stocks Rebound as Inflation Shows Signs of Turning

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: In a newly-published whitepaper, Ripple recommended that the UK pull odds and ends of various crypto regulations from around the world.
articles.title: Ripple Urges UK to Craft ‘Bespoke Regulatory Framework’ for Crypto

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Firms offering consumers the ability to self-custody their crypto, like Ledger and Trezor, have seen an uptick in sales after FTX went bust.
articles.title: Crypto Cold Wallets in Ledger, Trezor Sales Moon After FTX Collapse

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The popular adage, Not your Keys, Not your Coins, is making the rounds in the wake of the latest exchange meltdown. But what does it actually mean?
articles.title: Not Your Keys, Not Your Crypto: What to Know Before the Next FTX-type Meltdown

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Bahamas Securities Commission today approved provisional liquidators from PwC to oversee the ongoing bankruptcy process for FTX.
articles.title: Big 4 Accounting Firm PwC Approved as Joint Provisional FTX Liquidators

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Are CryptoPunks modern art? Yuga Labs believes so, and aims to solidify their historical legacy by placing the Ethereum PFPs within art museums.
articles.title: CryptoPunks Come to Art Museums as Yuga Labs Begins Donating Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Today, Uniswap became the second-largest exchange after Binance for Ethereum trading in the last 24 hours.
articles.title: Uniswap Overtakes Coinbase as Second-Largest Exchange Trading Ethereum Today

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX-owned cryptocurrency exchange Liquid Global has announced the suspension of all fiat and crypto withdrawals.
articles.title: Liquid Global Halts Withdrawals as FTX Contagion Continues

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The NBA team is the latest sports franchise to cut ties with the now-bankrupt FTX, which splurged big money on sports sponsorships.
articles.title: Golden State Warriors Joins List of Sports Franchises Cutting FTX Ties

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The hacker involved in draining the bankrupt crypto exchange FTX made several cross-chain transactions to cash out.
articles.title: FTX Attacker Still Owns Altcoins Worth $338 Million

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto-centric venture firm Sino Global Capital has confirmed its exposure to FTX amounting to “mid-seven figures.”
articles.title: Crypto Venture Firm Sino Global Reveals 'Mid-Seven Figures' Exposure to Bankrupt FTX

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: New filings also confirm FTX Exchange’s new leadership is in touch with regulators and dealing with Friday’s hack.
articles.title: Over 1 Million Creditors Could Have Claims in FTX Bankruptcy

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt: Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Rea Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
articles.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
